pages.text: The $(item)Feeding Frenzy$(0) perk decreases the time to generate the mobs. Higher levels of this perk will decrease the time further. When a factory contains multiple mobs, then the mob with the smallest rate reduction will be used.
$(li)Tier I - 20%% decrease$(li)Tier II - 50%% decrease$(li)Tier III - 75%% decrease
